thread.title: Technology stocks retreat from record high

title: Technology stocks retreat from record high
text:
Technology stocks retreat from record high   01:46 
Technology stocks rallied at the start of a big week of earnings for the sector globally, while bond yields hit multi-year highs as investors braced for major central banks to step back from ultra-easy monetary policies. Sonia Legg reports
